code: import React,{createContext,useContext}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ApiContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export const useApi=()=>{const context=useContext(ApiContext);if(!context){throw new Error("useApi must be used within an ApiProvider");}return context;};const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||"/api";export const ApiProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const getConfig=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/config"));const data=await response.json();return data.data;}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching config:",error);return null;}};const getProjects=async function(){let params=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};try{const queryString=new URLSearchParams(params).toString();const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/projects?").concat(queryString));const data=await response.json();return data.data;}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching projects:",error);return[];}};const getProject=async id=>{try{const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/projects/").concat(id));const data=await response.json();return data.data;}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching project:",error);return null;}};const submitContact=async formData=>{try{const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/contact"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(formData)});const data=await response.json();return data;}catch(error){console.error("Error submitting contact:",error);return{success:false,message:"Failed to send message"};}};const value={getConfig,getProjects,getProject,submitContact};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ApiContext.Provider,{value:value,children:children});};export default ApiContext;
